teaser: Airing on Monday, December 22, 2014: First up on today's show, Will Oremus, Senior Technology writer for Slate, talks about the future of connected cars. And from the archives, we revisit a conversation with Neil Young about his Pono high-resolution audio player, recorded at this year's SXSW.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, December 22, 2014
description: Airing on Monday, December 22, 2014: First up on today's show, Will Oremus, Senior Technology writer for Slate, talks about the future of connected cars. And from the archives, we revisit a conversation with Neil Young about his Pono high-resolution audio player, recorded at this year's SXSW.
